Articles.Content:
Hey guys!

Reinstalled my laptop and now I'm stuck with the default Windows wallpaper. I want a cool space themed wallpaper. Anyone of you got a cool one?

I prefer a real photo rather than a sci/fi image.
I have one of the new Pluto images as my current wallpaper.
Check out [apod.nasa.gov](http://apod.nasa.gov/apod/astropix.html). It's a huge library of space photos and many of them make great wallpapers.

Here's a bunch I've gathered over the years.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/PTrzo)
I've heard that moon landing hoax theory websites have high-res scans of Apollo hardware.

If you want good KSP backgrounds I suggest going to [Rareden's render thread.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25231-Rareden-s-Projects) He has some amazing stuff. 

Also check out [Starwhip's renderfarm](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111633-Starwhip-s-Renderfarm), for a few cool craft renders.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-22T00:03:38Z" title="07/22/2015 12:03  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 22, 2015</time> by Endersmens**

> 
> If you want good KSP backgrounds I suggest going to [Rareden's render thread.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25231-Rareden-s-Projects) He has some amazing stuff. 
> Also check out [Starwhip's renderfarm](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111633-Starwhip-s-Renderfarm), for a few cool craft renders.

What, you beat me to my own self-advertisement? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Rareden's stuff is way better than mine though. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> What, you beat me to my own self-advertisement? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> Rareden's stuff is way better than mine though. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Cause he makes his renders using in game textures. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Here's a bunch I've gathered over the years.
> [http://imgur.com/a/PTrzo](http://imgur.com/a/PTrzo)

If you don't mind, I snatched a few while is was here.

These are too good to pass up!

There're some pics in there that I've never seen before.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-22T10:44:54Z" title="07/22/2015 10:44  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 22, 2015</time> by T-Bouw**
